title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part is intended to improve the safety of workers, pedestrians and motorists within a highway work area by allowing for speed
limit reductions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
164.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
